Southeast Asia from Singapore | Carnival Cruise Lines | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Southeast Asia from Singapore 10 Days | Singapore Roundtrip Bonus AUD$400 Onboard Credit per stateroom Deal Details Travel Dates 27 Feb 27 Sale Ends Nov 30, 2025 Priced From $1,949 per person Enquire Now Bonus AUD$400 Onboard Credit per stateroom Set sail on a 10-day voyage of discovery that begins and ends in dazzling Singapore. Your journey unfolds with sun-soaked Fun Days at Sea, where you can unwind by the pool, indulge in world-class dining, or experience vibrant onboard entertainment. In Koh Samui, sink your toes into white sandy beaches and swim in turquoise waters surrounded by lush tropical beauty. Then, immerse yourself in the cultural heart of Bangkok via the port of Laem Chabang—where golden temples, floating markets, and rich traditions await. Next, experience the laid-back charm of Sihanoukville, Cambodia, with its stunning beachfront bars and seaside delights. Continue to Phu My (Ho Chi Minh City) in Vietnam, a city alive with history, culture, and mouthwatering cuisine. With a perfect balance of adventure, relaxation, and discovery, this Southeast Asian cruise promises unforgettable moments at every port—and plenty of time to soak in the sea breeze along the way. Pricing Interior Stateroom (4E) from $1949*pp twin share Balcony Stateroom pictured (8D) from $2565*pp twin share What's Included A variety of room types, with options to sleep up to 5 people per room Stateroom attendant and daily turn-down service Great options for all six meals — breakfast, brunch, lunch, afternoon tea, dinner and late-night, that is — at the full-service Main Dining Room or the casual Lido Restaurant Specialty food spots for breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacking Lemonade, iced tea, hot chocolate, non-bottled water and non-specialty coffee and tea Amazing stage shows, live musical performances, stand-up comedy and more Clubs, bars and lounges featuring DJs spinning, karaoke, piano sing-alongs and more Deck parties, game shows, trivia contests and more fun ways to get involved A fully-stocked fitness center, plus outdoor sports activities Pools and hot tubs for all, plus an Adults-Only Retreat Itinerary Day 1 Singapore (Embarkation) Day 2 Fun Day at Sea Day 3 Koh Samui 7.00am - 4.00pm Day 4 Laem Chabang (Bangkok) 7.00am - 6.00pm Day 5 Sihanoukville 10.00am - 7.00pm Day 6 Fun Day at Sea Day 7 Phu My (Ho Chi Minh) 7.00am - 8.00pm Day 8 Fun Day at Sea Day 9 Fun Day at Sea Day 10 Singapore (Disembarkation) Your Ship - Carnival Adventure Offering 13 decks and a world of fun at your fingertips, Carnival Adventure is perfect for families, couples and groups of friends who are looking to experience it all. Sailing from Sydney, plus select cruises from Melbourne and Singapore, Carnival Adventure has a huge variety of activities on board, including exciting waterslides, four relaxing pools, a thrilling Edge Adventure Park, plus a huge range of bars, entertainment and dining options. You might start your day at the waterslides, or Edge, complete with ziplining, rock climbing and abseiling. Then enjoy a lazy morning poolside, followed by a delicious family lunch. Or, how about a relaxing massage at the day spa while the kids have the time of their lives in the kids clubs? Throw delicious dining at Luke’s Bar & Grill, great bars, and world-class entertainment into the mix and you’ve got yourself a holiday lineup that can only be described as an adventure Terms & Conditions Choice Fare T&C’s: Pricing is correct as of 17 October 25. From price is per person twin share valid for sale until 30 November 2025, unless otherwise stated, withdrawn or sold out prior. Valid for new bookings only. Not combinable with other offers. Supplements apply for higher room grades, categories and fare types. Some rooms have obstructed views. Offer ends 30-11-25 unless sold out prior. Offer is available on select Carnival sailings a through July 2028. Advertised fares are available until allocation is exhausted and may fluctuate. ~50% Reduced Deposits: non-refundable, per person/twin share. 2-3 day sailings: $50pp, 4-5 day sailings: $75pp, 6-9 day sailings: $125pp, 10+ day sailings: $200pp. Remainder of the standard deposit and final payment for all guests is due on final payment due date. Offer is not valid for bookings made within the final payment period. ^Onboard Credit (OBC) if applicable is per room, in AUD and applied to the first 2 guests in the room only. Amount varies by itinerary duration as specified. For cruises 2-5 days: $100pp (up to $200 per room). For cruises 6+ days: $200pp (up to $400 per room). OBC expires at the conclusion of your cruise, is not refundable, transferable, Experience the world differently.
